channel.title: asian on Mostly Harmless Cafe
channel.description: Recent content in asian on Mostly Harmless Cafe

item.title: Dead's Fried Rice
item.description: Ingredients (chicken): 1 chicken thigh 1 tbsp shaoxing wine subst: 1 tbsp chicken stock and 1 tsp of lemon juice 1 tbsp soy sauce 1 tbsp gochujang 1 tsp ground ginger 1 tsp garlic powder 1 tsp salt Recommended marinade time, 45 min or overnight (optimal) Ingredients (rice): 1 cup rice (uncooked) chicken stock subst: water ½ onion (diced) 2 inch knob of ginger (minced) 2 eggs (scrambled) 1 tbsp soy sauce 1 clove of garlic (grated) 1 tbsp sambal oelek 1 green onion (thinly sliced) Instructions (chicken): Carve chicken thigh (if necessary), removing bone and skin, and cut into bite size pieces.

item.title: General Dead's Chicken
item.description: Ingredients (chicken): 2 chicken thighs 2 tbsp shaoxing wine (subst.: 1 tbsp soy sauce) 1 tbsp soy sauce 2 cloves of garlic (grated) 1 inch knob of ginger (grated) pinch of salt Recommended marinade time: 45 min or overnight (optimal) Ingredients (dredge): 2 cups of flour 1 cup of corn starch 2 eggs (whites) Ingredients (sauce): 1 tbsp shaoxing wine subst: chinkiang vinegar ½ cup chicken stock 3 tbsp soy sauce 1 tbsp mirin optional subst: rice vinegar 3 tbsp sugar 1 tsp msg 3 cloves of garlic (minced) 3 inch knob of ginger (minced) 1 habanero pepper (diced) 1 tbsp cornstarch 1 ½ tbsp vinegar Instructions: Put egg whites in bowl, whisk.

item.title: General Tsos Chicken
item.description: Ingredients (chicken): 2 chicken thighs 2 Tbsp Shaoxing Wine 1 Tbsp soy sauce 2 cloves of garlic (grated) 1 inch knob of ginger (grated) pinch of salt Recommended marinade time, 45 min or overnight (optimal) Ingredients (sauce): 1 Tbsp Shaoxing Wine ½ cup chicken stock 3 Tbsp soy sauce 3 Tbsp sugar 4 cloves of garlic (minced) 2 inch knob of ginger (minced) 1 tsp chili flakes 5 dried chili peppers 1 Tbsp cornstarch 1 ½ Tbsp vinegar Instructions: Dredge chicken in a 1:1 mix of cornstarch and flour.

item.title: Japanese Wafu Pasta
item.description: Ingredients 1 lb spaghetti ¼ cup extra-virgin olive oil 8 Tbsp unsalted butter 4 cloves of garlic ¼ tsp salt 15 cranks of fresh cracked black pepper 1 lb shiitake mushrooms ¼ cup soy sauce 2 scallions (garnish) Instructions: Boil pasta for recommended time, set aside when done, reserving at least ½ cup of pasta water. In skillet on medium heat add olive oil with 4 Tbsp of butter. Once butter melts, add garlic and mushrooms.

item.title: Chow Mein
item.description: Ingredients (noodles): 400g egg noodles 2 chicken breasts (scored and chopped into bite-sized pieces) feel free to marinade 2 green onions (segmented) 1 carror (julienne) 3½ cups cabbage (about half of one head) 7 cloves of garlic (minced) 1 cup bean sprouts 2 Tbsp water Ingredients (sauce): 1½ Tbsp rice vinegar 2½ Tbsp soy sauce 2 Tbsp oyster sauce subst: hoisin sauce 3 tsp sesame oil 2 tsp cornstarch Instructions: Cook chicken to completion in wok, remove, and set to the side.
